welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Perkiomen! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that Perkiomen has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all arriving and departing flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal used for regional flights at Lehigh Valley International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
